items.sentence: If you can't say something nice, don't say anything at all.
Tom bought two chocolate bars and gave one of them to Mary.
I still have some questions that I'd like to have answered.
We ate dinner late because Tom got caught in a traffic jam.
Tom suddenly realized what he was doing was very dangerous.
That isn't the only reason why Tom ought to have done that.
You're practically giving them away with prices that cheap.
Tom will probably already be asleep by the time I get home.
Mary doesn't need makeup. She's pretty just the way she is.
A quick sniff of the tofu proved it to be well past expiry.
